entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • m_alignpad = 0 assert failure #70958
  • tail calls #70957
  • NativeAOT compiler crash with NRE #70952
  • ImmutableList<T>.LastIndexOf(...) appears to be missing a guard clause #70950
  • HTTP/3: Uninformative message when HTTP/3 connection fails #70949
  • Ensure JsonSerializer / source generator works well with required members #70945
    7.0.0

Closed

  • `fgMakeOutgoingStructArgCopy` doesn't check the ABI when reusing implicit byrefs #70954
    7.0.0
  • Exposing C code to CoreCLR host #70953
  • Unnecessary comparisons not eliminated for full range checks #70145
    Future
  • NativeAOT fails when calling through generic method with reference type using reflection #70951
  • Exceptions from EventRecordWrittenEventArgs are missing the original win32 error code #67702
    7.0.0
  • Random null reference in NativeAOT build #70946

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete the Unix x64 implicit byref quirk #70961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on Unix x64 #70960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: avoid cloning mid-entry loops with multiple non-loop entry preds #70959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #70956
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

Merged

  • Do not reuse implicit byrefs for by-value args #70955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on Windows x64 #70777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow ValueListBuilder to work with empty scratch spans #70917
    area-System.Collections
  • Enable IDE0030 (Use coalesce expression) #70948
    area-System.Net
  • Enable IDE0100 (Remove redundant equality) #70896
    area-Meta
  • Enable IDE0071 (Simplify interpolation) #70918
  • Update C# compiler used to build repo #70947
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable IDE0065 (Misplaced using directive) #70919
    area-System.Xml
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • EventLogException is missing the original win32 error code #70629
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution

Updated

  • R2R -> instrumented tier0 -> optimized tier1 #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Do not generate impossible instantiations for constrained generics in Mono AOT #70838
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Make SuperPMI more explicit about JIT in error messages #70938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on x86 #70779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: handle case where we are cloning adjacent sibling loops #70874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix arm64 funclet frame type 5 #70922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Convert fallback path of GetCommandLineArgs to managed #70608
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Update ValueStringBuilder grow logic #70942
  • [ignore][wasm] Add test trying to copy large array from javascript to wasm #70914
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [tests] Extend partial disablement of SkippingHiddenFiles (#65280) #70763
    area-System.IO
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • JIT: Run optRedundantBranches twice and try to compute more accurate doms #70907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix: [Wasm] Adjust windows build #70689
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet test fails on sdk 6.0.200 - System.AccessViolationException #24124

PullRequests

Updated

  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'Implement interface' should allow implicit implementation of non-public interface members #62014

Closed

  • Unexpected CS0529 and CS0146 #62006

PullRequests

Created

  • Inheritance completions massive improvement #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge common find-refs data into its own type. #62011
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #62008
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Simplify implementation of the FindRefsCache helper type #61941
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #62007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62010
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62009
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AddRoleValidator incorrect generic argument name #42294
  • HTTP/3: Connection timed out for response after the response is finished #42289
  • Consider updating support for TryParse conventional method to support IParsable<T> #42286
  • NavigationManager should be able to cancel the navigation request on LocationChanged in Blazor #42285

Closed

  • Can't use VS 2022 Latest preview (public) to generate a Angular project if .net 7 preview 5 is installed #42287
  • Blazor wasm publish fails after updating nuget packages to 6.0.6 and visual studio to 17.2.4 #42291
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Performance tests for HTTP/3 #28429
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove non-final HTTP/3 ALPN #42290
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Fix support for native AOT in minimal #42272
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Sync shared code from runtime #42288
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Route Groups] Support AddFilter, WithOpenApi and other additive conventions #42195
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, feature-minimal-hosting
  • Log error when exception occurs during streaming #42283
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix SignalR Streaming example #42281
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stacklayout within stacklayout not centering correctly #8166
  • Implicit cast from Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.RectF to Android.Graphics.RectF returns wrong result #8165
  • Shell doesn't trigger OnAppearing on Second Page #8164
  • Usability: Too much documentation shown in Visual Studio for Button Type #8163
  • [Feature] Auto compiled binding on CollectionView's ItemTemplate, GroupHeaderTemplate and GroupFooterTemplate #8161
  • Shell Margin Exception #8160
  • [Android] Shell.Current.GoToAsync throws exception 'Current Root View cannot be null' #8159
  • XmlnsDefinitionAttribute and CS0246 The type or namespace name could not be found #8158
  • Modal Navigation does not work or throws exception prior to Window Creation/Parenting #8157

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the Microsoft.Maui.Dispatching using #8162
    area/dispatching, 6.0-sr2

Updated

  • Fix for #5523 MauiWebView not loading local files on Windows #7672
    platform/windows 🪟, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, 6.0-sr2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to specify SerializerOptions when working with UseCosmos ? #28270
  • How do I add related Data in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.InMemory ? #28269
  • Version 7.0.0-preview.5.22302.2 not work with Microsoft.Data.SqlClient 5.0.0-preview3.22168.1 #28268
  • Use DbDataSource.CreateCommand when a transaction isn't necessary #28267
  • Basic support for DbDataSource #28266
  • Why can't a CosmosDB partition key be an int when working with EF Core? #28265

Closed

  • Terrible documentation for many to many relationships #28262
  • efcore 6.0.6 notmapped apply datetime property is invalid #28256
